properties.name: feature-flags.features
properties.description: Flag settings that control the enable/disable of each function. The key indicates the function name and the value indicates enable (true) or disable (false).

properties.name: feature-flags.response.status
properties.description: HTTP status code returned when access is denied.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.body.enabled
properties.description: Controls whether a response body is included when access is denied; if true, a response body is returned.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.body.mode
properties.description: Mode setting that determines the content of the response body returned when access is denied.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.body.json.default-fields.enabled
properties.description: Controls whether the default property is included in the response body.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.body.json.default-fields.title
properties.description: Defines the title (summary) of the JSON response returned when access is denied.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.body.json.default-fields.detail
properties.description: Defines the detailed message of the JSON response returned when access is denied.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.body.json.custom-fields
properties.description: Mapping of custom fields to be included in the response. The key represents the field name and the value represents its content.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.body.text.message
properties.description: Defines the text message returned when access is denied.
